alert.note: Alert for Lane; Scott (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 11:05PM CDT by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Scott and northwestern Lane Counties through 1145 PM CDT... At 1104 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles southeast of Monument to 8 miles west of Scott State Lake to near Leoti. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Scott State Lake around 1120 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Modoc, Manning, Grigston, Shallow Water, Healy and Amy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
